metadata.title: CVE-2017-17446 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Mem_File_Reader::read_avail function in Data_Reader.cpp in theGame_Music_Emu library (aka game-music-emu) 0.6.1 does not ensure anon-negative size, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: game-music-emu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
